deleteTagGroupContentConfirm: Искате ли да изтриете тази тагова група '{{tagGroup}}' ?
deleteLocationContentAlert: Искате ли да изтриете това файлово място '{{locationName}}'?
addTagsToGroupTitle: Добави етикети към групата от етикети
addTagsToGroupTagsPlaceholder: Списък от етикети разделени със запетайка
fullTextIndexRegenerate: The search index for this location should be regenerated before performing full text searches. Do you want to start indexing?
deleteDirectoryContentConfirm: Сигурен ли сте че иската да изтриете папката: '{{dirPath}}' ?
errorDeletingDirectoryAlert: Deleting '{{dirPath}}' failed. Folder probably not empty.
locationExist: Location already exist, it will be replaced with this one
showUnixHiddenFiles: Show files/folders with a dot(.) in front of the name (e.g. Unix, Linux, OS X hidden files)
checkForNewVersionOnStartup: Провери за нова версия при стартиране на приложението.
reorderTags: Enable changing the tag order with drag and drop
calculateTag: Extracts the tags used in the current folder
tagDelimiter: Делотел на таговете (например при 'Filename[TAG1_TAG2]', '_' е делителя)
prefixTagContainer: Префикс за контейнера с етикети (например при 'Filename_[TAG1].txt', '_' е префикса)
fileNameHelp: File name should be at least one character long and should not contain the following characters: # / \ : * ? " < > |
directoryNameHelp: Folder name should be at least one character long and should not contain the following characters: # / \ : * ? " < > |
useDefaultLocation: Използвайте местонахождението по подразбиране като начално местонахождение
enablingUsingMetaFolder: Enable the use of a hidden folder(.ts) for storing meta data and thumbnails
persistTagsInSidecarFile: Do not rename files on tagging (use sidecar files)
addTagsToLibrary: Collect new tags in the tag library
useTrashCan: Move deleted files or folders to trash bin if available
useTrashCanInfo: Files and folders from e.g. S3 buckets will be deleted directly since there is no trash bin support
invalidImportFile: Импортираният файл е с невалиден формат
useTextExtraction: Активирай екстрактването на текст от файлове
useGenerateThumbnails: Активирай генерирането на картинки за предварител преглед
loadLocationMetaData: Loads location meta data (currently only tag groups)
showTagAreaOnStartup: Always show tag area on startup
colorChangesToAllTags: Apply color changes to all tags of the group
name: TagSpaces
openFileNatively: Отвори файла с приложението по подразбиране
showFilesWithTags: Search for tags from this group
showFilesWithTagsTooltip: Show files or folders tagged with at least one tag from this tag group
removeTagTooltip: Do you really want to remove this tag?
deleteTagFromTagGroupContentConfirm: Do you want to delete the tag '{{tagName}}' from the taggroup?
tagSearchORTitle: Entry should contain at least one of the tags (OR search)
tagSearchANDTitle: Entry should contain all of the tags (AND search)
createFileTitle: Create new files, folders or locations
createNoteTitle: Use to create a document with rich text formatting.
createTextFileTitle: Use to create a plain text file with no formatting.
createMarkdownTitle: Use to create a digital note or just a text file with simple formatting.
addFilesTitle: Add or upload files from your computer.
openNewInstance: Opens new application window or tab
setAsThumbnail: Use as Thumbnail for Current Folder
setAsParentFolderThumbnail: Use as Thumbnail for Parent Folder
deleteConfirmationContent: The selected entries will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
enableWS: Enable generating thumbnails and search index in separate process
closeButtonDialog: Press ESC to close this dialog
confirmResetSettings: Attention!!! Confirming this dialog will irreversibly remove all connected locations, all the tags from the tag library and will restore the default settings of the app. Do you want to proceed?
confirmFileTypeDeletion: Do you want to delete this file type?
confirmTagDeletion: Are you sure you want to remove this tag?
confirmSelectedTagsDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the selected tags?
confirmAllTagsDeletion: Are you sure you want to remove all tags?
latestVersion: You are on the latest version of {{productName}}
saveFileBeforeClosingFile: Do you want to save the changes before closing the file?
thisFunctionalityIsAvailableInPro: This functionality is available in the PRO version
featureInBetaStatus: This feature is in BETA status
doYouWantToDeleteFile: Do you want to delete the file?
currentlyFileChangedSaveOrClose: Currently opened file was changed, please first save or close it.
showHideEntriesDescription: Show description for files and folders
showTags: Show tags for files and folders
readonlyModeSwitch: Open this location in read-only mode
persistIndexSwitch: Switch to manual index creation with persisted search index
createFullTextIndex: Enable full text search for TXT, MD and HTML files
watchForChangesInLocation: Watch for external changes in this location
tagDelimiterChoose: Tag delimiter (e.g. Filename [TAG1_TAG2], _ is the delimiter)
upgradeToPro: See what's in the PRO version
notImplementedYet: Not implemented yet, please use the save button.
removingTagsInSidecarFileFailed: Removing tags in sidecar file failed
tagTitleHelper: Tags should be at least 1 character long and should not contain: spaces, \, / #
toggleThumbnailModeTitle: Switch between cover and contain thumbnail modes
parentDirNotInLocation: Unable to navigate! Parent folder not in the current location.
mustContainTheseTags: Must contain all of these tags
atLeastOneOfTheseTags: At least one of these tags
collectTagsFromLocationTitle: Collects all tags found on files or folders in the current location
searchCurrentFolderWithSubFolders: Search in the current folder including subfolders
dndDisabledReadOnlyMode: Importing files is disabled because the location is in read-only mode.
smartTagNowDescription: Adds the current date and time as a tag
smartTagTodayDescription: Adds the current date as a tag
smartTagTomorrowDescription: Adds the date of tomorrow as a tag
smartTagYesterdayDescription: Adds the date of yesterday as a tag'
smartTagMonthDescription: Adds the current year and month as a tag
smartTagYearDescription: Adds the current year as a tag
smartTagGeoDescription: Add custom geographical coordinates as a tag
smartTagDateDescription: Add custom date as a tag
getLatestVersionPro: Please download the latest version from the link in the purchase confirmation email.
noFileButFoldersFound: Some folders found! Turn on the folder visibility from the perspective's toolbar to view them.
dragAndDropToImport: Drag and drop files here to copy or upload them.
localLocation: Local - pointing to a local folder
enableIndexingBySearch: By enabling this option, the search will deliver better results, but it will take longer
fileExist: File with the same name already exist
pageLimitHelp: Set number of files per page
choosePerspective: Set default perspective for this folder
sharingLinkTooltip: Link for sharing to other TagSpaces installation using the same location IDs
copyLinkToClipboard: Copy the link to the clipboard
downloadLinkTooltip: Link and QR-code for time limited sharing on the Internet
filesLimit: Max. files to be displayed in a folder
scrollFilesLimit: Files to be loaded on scroll down
gobackClarification: Navigate to last opened file, folder or location
extractGeoCoordinates: Extract geo-coordinates from files as tags
thumbAlreadyExists: Thumbnail for '{{directoryName}}' already exists, do you want to override it?
setupTOTPHelp: Setup mutli-factor authentication (MFA) with time-based one-time password (TOTP) generated from auth apps (e.g. Google Authenticator)
verifyTOTPCodeHelp: Scan the QR with an auth app (e.g. Google Authenticator) and enter the generated code here
confirmResetColor: Do you really want to clear this color?
maxIndexAgeHelp: After this time elapses, the search index will be invalidated
searchExist: Search already exist, it will be replaced with this one
savedSearchHelp: Save the current search parameters for a later use of this search
exportCsv: Export current file and folder list as CSV file
serverIsDefaultHelp: Set as Default Map Tile Server
addTileServersHelp: Further map tile servers can be found in the OpenStreetMap documentation
addTileServersSettings: In order to see the map, add at least one map tile server in the settings of the app
noSubFoldersFound: No subfolders in the current folder
ignorePatternsHelp: The search will ignore folders added here
pathNotInCurrentLocation: Ignore pattern path is not in the current location
enableTagsFromLocationHelp: These are tags which are saved in the location's folder, making them visible for other users of this folder
clearFolderColor: Clears the color of this folder
useDefaultTaggingType: Use the default tagging type from the settings
tagsInFilenameExplanation: Use the name of file for saving the tags - Tagging 'photo437.jpg' with a tag 'sunset' will rename it to 'image[sunset].jpg'
tagsInSidecarFileExplanation: Use sidecar file for saving the tags - Tagging 'photo437.jpg' with a tag 'sunset' will store this tag in an additional sidecar file called 'image.jpg.json' located in a sub-folder called '.ts'
enterTimePeriodTooltip: Filter the search results for a given time period
storedSearchQueriesTooltip: Stored search queries for later use
filterByLastModifiedDateTooltip: Filter the search result by last modified date
filterBySizeTooltip: Filter the search results by their file size
filterByTypTooltip: Filter the search result by their type
useCurrentIndexTooltip: Will the use the already created search index, if it is not expired
forceReindexTooltip: Will force the re-creation of the search index
searchTypeFuzzyTooltip: Delivers broader search results, tolerating typos in the seach query
searchTypeSemiStrictTooltip: Exact search in file path, description and text content (by enabled full-text search)
searchTypeStrictTooltip: Same as semi-strict but case sensitive
warningOpeningFilesExternally: Show warning on opening files externally
sharingLinkCopied: Link for sharing copied to the clipboard
sharingLinkFailed: Copying the link to clipboard failed
perspectiveInPro: This perspective is part of TagSpaces Pro. Do you want to learn more about it?
exifGeo: Import EXIF latitude and longitude as geo-tag
exifDateTime: Import EXIF image shooting date and times as date tag
iptcDescription: Import IPTC description as file description
exifDialogExplanation: This functionality will traverse all JPG files from the current folder and import the data from the selected EXIF/IPTC fields as tags
folderWithCustomPerspectiveSetting: Current folder has custom settings for this perspective
showCurrentFolderContent: Show content of the current folder
showEntriesDescription: Show description for files and folders
linkValidityTooltip: Time for which the link is valid
setRevisionsEnabledHelp: Creates a revision every time a file is saved
removeExtensionTooltip: Are you sure you want to remove '{{extensionName}}' extension?
resolveConflictDesc: For saving your changes as new file click on 'Save As' button, for override the external changes click the 'Override' button.
entriesWillBeCreatedIn: Files and folders will be created in:
noSuitableLocation: Files or folders can't be created. No suitable location found!
platformImplMissing: Feature not supported on this platform
errorCORS: The URL can not be access, CORS error
noImagesInFolder: This folder does not contain any images
